# primaryConstituentDeviceSwitchingBehaviorForRecording

**Instance Property**

The camera switching behavior to use for recording.

## Declaration

```swift
var primaryConstituentDeviceSwitchingBehaviorForRecording: AVCaptureDevice.PrimaryConstituentDeviceSwitchingBehavior { get }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/PrimaryConstituentDeviceSwitchingBehavior-swift.enum/restricted].

This property is key-value observable.

## Restricting camera switching

- **isPrimaryConstituentDeviceSwitchingBehaviorForRecordingEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to restrict constituent device switching behavior during recording.
- **setPrimaryConstituentDeviceSwitchingBehaviorForRecording(_:restrictedSwitchingBehaviorConditions:)**: Sets the camera switching behavior to use during recording.
- **primaryConstituentDeviceRestrictedSwitchingBehaviorConditionsForRecording**: The conditions during which camera switching may occur while recording.
